page.title: 11 Cars in West Stafford.
page.content: We wanted to find out about cars .We wanted to know how many people had cars and what they used them for. Also we did a survey on how much traffic travelled along a main road, a secondary road and a minor road near our school.We asked 307 children about car ownership and use. We found that 25% of families used the car for work,39% for taking children to school,48% for shopping, 41% for everyday use,15% for holidays 2% for other uses. 38% had more than one vehicle. The next thing we did was the traffic survey.We found that in fifteen minutes we saw 12 vehicles on a minor road,89 on a secondary road,201 on a main road.Out of all the vehicles a third were British,two thirds were foreign.
